resources.string: How we conceptualize a ship inspection-preparation is much different from conventional methods. We work with companies, training institutes or Pre-Vetting Inspectors to develop their inspection processes and improve results. There’s a ton of Free stuff for seafarers.\nTo know how we do it, and the many benefits involved, view a demo, or contact us. We shall be happy to personalize a demo exclusively for you!
You are not a member? Register.
It Seems you don\'t have active internet connection.
We already have account registered with this email.
Password must be at least 8 characters long
Something went wrong. Please try again later.
You need to complete any section before generating a report for that.
Wish to view this report? View.

Hello,

Please find attachment to this mail a copy of the Section Report.

CONFIDENTIAL: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify the system manager.


Regards,
Navigator Guide Team

Hello Admin,

I am writing this email for requesting access of %1$s section. I would inspect this section as a %2$S and Ship Type is %3$s. Please provide me access of %4$s section till the %5$s so I can complete the inspection process in the time specified.



Regards,
%6$s

The permission is missing.

To grant this permission click on Settings, then Permissions and turn the permission on.

Then click back twice to return to the app
Are you sure you want to reset all inspection records permanently?
Before you proceed, please enter the ship\'s name which you are going to be inspect.
Before you proceed, let us inform you that you are going to be inspect %1$s.
You are not allowed to access this section. If you wish to access please select extension date and contact to Administrator.
